headline: Best Stock to Buy Right Now: Constellation Brands vs. Coca Cola
summary: Constellation Brands (NYSE: STZ) commands a dominant position in the U.S. beer market, while Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO) is recognized for its iconic global soft drink empire.  At the time of this writing, Coca-Cola stock has returned 15% year to date, while shares of Constellation Brands are down 16% over the same period.  Should investors stick with the pop in Coca-Cola for further gains, or can the stars align for Constellation Brands to turn things around?

headline: 2 Warren Buffett Stocks to Hold Forever
summary: Warren Buffett is known for saying his favorite holding period is "forever."  In fact, it's been a net seller of stocks for the past nine quarters, a rarity for the holding company.  Throughout this time, there are two stocks (among others) he hasn't touched that he has said several times he would never sell: Coca-Cola (NYSE: KO) and American Express (NYSE: AXP).

headline: What We Can Learn From Companies That Brought Great Ideas to Life
summary: Investors weren't exactly wrong to be excited about the companies trying to make meal kits and plant-based meat cool. But they sure haven't made any money from those bets. So...what went wrong?
